item.text: A character gains Character Option Points every level, that they can use to increase their HP, BAB, Saving Throws, or Skill Points when they level.
CHP Formula 2+CON or Racial CHP formula
Combat Points 15 or Racial CP score

Focused Skills Choose 7. Each Knowledge, Craft, and Perform skill is singular. Linguistics and Knowledge (Pop Culture and Streetwise) are always focused. A character only chooses these skills at 1st level.
